page.title: 16EDUCATION
page.content: There are 2 study/conference centres in Castleton,the Lindley lodge one and Losehill Hall(Peak District National park).Lindley Lodge run courses to do with iniative and on managment skills;Losehill hall run courses to do with the countryside,such as walking, conservation,landscape formation, country houses,Farming in the peak and so on. Here are 1984 details for each centre.
